dcterms:description: A dataset containing discussions from Reddit subreddits: askwomen, askmen, and politics, used for modeling threaded discussions and predicting comment popularity.

dcterms:description: A general dataset from Reddit used to understand the interplay between titles, content, and communities in social media.
